SELECT a.id, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_icon menuIcon, a.title_name titleName, a.menu_level menuLevel, a.menu_type menuType, a.menu_sys_type menuSysType, a.menu_parent_id parentId, a.menu_url menuUrl, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, b.user_name userName, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(c.menu_name separator '->'), '创世菜单') menuParentName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_role_menu d WHERE d.menu_id = a.id) roleNum FROM sys_eve_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user b ON a.creater = b.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_menu c ON INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.menu_parent_id, ','), CONCAT(',', c.id, ',')) WHERE 1=1
AND a.menu_name LIKE '%${menuName}%'
AND a.menu_url LIKE '%${menuUrl}%'
AND INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.menu_parent_id, ','), CONCAT(',', #{parentId}, ','))
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
